text:
Heads of all the four constituent parties of People’s Welfare Front (PWF), G. Ramakrishnan, Thol.Thirumavalavan, Vaiko and R.Mutharsan are to address a public meeting scheduled to be held here on March 3.

Titled as ‘uprising meet of alternative politics’ the meet will be held in front of Anna statue in the town. If the election date is notified or if there is any breakthrough in the much dragged alliance deliberations in Tamil Nadu politics in the two days preceding the scheduled meet, the meeting could be termed as the first campaign meeting. – Staff Reporter
title: PWF leaders to address meet
